revision.text: [[File:Badge case 2.0.png|thumb|365px]] '''Gyms''' are special areas in Pokéclicker where the player can earn gym badges and unlock new routes by defeating the gym leader in a battle. There are 8 or More gyms in each region plus the Pokémon League building, which includes the Elite 4 trainers and the champion.
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
